summary: A denial of service vulnerability exists in MongoDB Server when processing a crafted BSON object, allowing a remote attacker to crash the server.
details: A denial of service vulnerability exists in MongoDB Server when processing a crafted BSON object, allowing a remote attacker to crash the server.

summary: A vulnerability in the Classic Query Engine in MongoDB Server can lead to a denial of service when processing a crafted query.
details: A vulnerability in the Classic Query Engine in MongoDB Server can lead to a denial of service when processing a crafted query.

summary: A vulnerability in the $lookup stage of MongoDB Server allows an attacker to bypass document-level security controls and access unauthorized data.
details: A vulnerability in the $lookup stage of MongoDB Server allows an attacker to bypass document-level security controls and access unauthorized data.

summary: A denial of service vulnerability exists in MongoDB Server when processing a crafted query with the $in operator.
details: A denial of service vulnerability exists in MongoDB Server when processing a crafted query with the $in operator.

summary: A vulnerability in the S2 geometry library integration in MongoDB Server can lead to a denial of service when processing crafted geoJSON data.
details: A vulnerability in the S2 geometry library integration in MongoDB Server can lead to a denial of service when processing crafted geoJSON data.
